1: <pb/><t>A Jehová, Rey toni. Miman txequel is mimanbilal Cham, c'al is yipalil. Yet watx' c'am chi bil yulyibank'inal ti', caw max yutcan Cham.</t>
2: <t>Mamin Jehová ayc'alta' ekbej yettax yichbanil tu'. Toc'alta' ayach ec' ach ti'.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, a a' mimek aejlak chi bilaj a', cax chi aj chulnaj a'.</t>
4: <t>Axa pax ach Mamin Jehová, Yajaw ach bay satcan, ec'ban ach bay juntzan aejlak tu'. Ec'ban ach bay yipalil a' mar tu'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, yelxac'al ay yikbej a k'anej. Moj tol chi txecloj yin tojbalk'inal, tol asannej ton ach ay et a templo.</t>
